Self.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by the creator. The word 'self'.

Guild.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by members of the guild. The word 'guild'.

Global.description: A ressource with this permissions can be seen by everyone. The word 'global'.

None.description: No action is performed. The word 'none'.

ContentDeleted.description: The message is deleted. The word 'content deleted'.

CaseCreated.description: A case is created. The word 'case created'.

ContentDeletedAndCaseCreated.description: The message is deleted and a case is created. The word 'content deleted and case created'.
